selected_quotes: Storage of images in DNA, sequence using MinION, post process (homopol) and recover images!
DNA-based storage is becoming a hot topic. Portable and Error-Free DNA-Based Data Storage
Portable Error-Free DNA Data Storage: potentially unprecedented density, durability replication efficiency…
With random access and nanopore sequencing 'Portable and Error-Free DNA-Based Data Storage'
Error free compression+retrieval of information using DNA and portable sequencers
